alert.note: Alert for Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 3:58PM CDT until June 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Seward County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Tyrone, or 9 miles southwest of Woods, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Woods and Liberal. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
